data.name: Rock Life: The Rock Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Built from the ground up, Rock Life is the next generation of rock simulation.
Explore and feel nature as you become one with rocks and nature.
Become and experience life as a rock via Desktop or through Virtual Reality!

What do you do in Rock Life: The Rock Simulator?
Play as a rock!
Play as rock with others in co-op!
Enjoy the environment as a rock!
Become different rocks as a rock!
Enjoy playing as a rock in Virtual Reality!

Become THE ROCK!

data.short_description: Built from the ground up, Rock Life is the next generation of immersion and simulations. Live, do, and experience what it is like to truly become one with nature... as a rock!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220/Athlon II X4 638 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 1GB, AMD Radeon RX 550 2GB equivalent or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 4GB, AMD Radeon R9 290 4GB equivalent or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
